name: Unified Help Desk

screenshots.caption: List asset dynamically. Includes a search function based on asset name, assigned user, department, and more!
Because this version uses SQLCE (Compact), multiple databases are supported, connection strings are dynamic and able to be set within the application itself!

short_description:
In a world where technology is ever increasing, and the demand for IT support continues to grow, there must be some common ground between IT Technicians and End Users... Welcome to Unified Help Desk. Closing the gap between the computer literate, and stone age employees. With a fully interactive Knowledge Support Database providing wiki's for your users, Help Desk Support Center  for those users that require assistance, and a powerful Asset Management System, Unified Help Desk brings you, your staff and your entire company power through unification. By grouping these key components into one power desktop application, it is easy to use, easy to find and provides high customization to support your companies needs.

Unified Help Desk  - Power Through Unification
